PositionHistory.Title: Sr. System Analyst

PositionHistory.Description: * Presently working in NSAAHQ from April `12 as Application Development Lead ;

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. System Analyst
Technical Lead

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Rakesh Kumar Vangala is a resident of New Britain, CT, US. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 22 years. Currently he is employed as a Sr. System Analyst at OTIS Elevator. Rakesh has extensive knowledge of Microsoft C-SHARP, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft ASP.NET, jQuery, Windows Mobile, SQL Server Reporting Services, SQL Server Integration Services, Oracle, MVC, Visual Basic, Infragistics, AJAX, XML, Web Services, SQL, Microsoft Transaction Server, Microsoft .NET Remoting, JDEdwards Suite, ActiveReports, WinForms, WebSphere MQ, Secure Socket Layer, SDLC, Razor, Progress 4GL, Oracle ERP, Oracle Applications, Microsoft .NET Technology, LDAP, ETL, DB2, Active Server Pages. Rakesh has a considerable management experience (2.1 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2003-10 for 26 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Technical Lead at KEANE Inc..
